amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for acquiring for inventories of the Department of Defense property in excess of the requirements for the inventories.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 774 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 774 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S6815-6818; text: CR S6815-6816) To prohibit the use of funds for acquiring for inventories of the Department of Defense property in excess of the requirements for the inventories.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 774 proposed by Senator Harkin.
